input_email_body:
Subject: Concerns About Decreased Engagement in Digital Marketing Campaigns

Noticing a decline in engagement with recent digital marketing efforts. This drop could be attributed to changes in algorithms or ineffective targeting strategies You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. So far, we've adjusted ad budgets, refreshed creative content, and analyzed audience insights. While these steps have shown some improvement, we would appreciate further guidance to optimize our campaigns for better performance. My name is Elena Ivanova.
